content.text: Not bad, it's just starting, actually. I'm about to start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
That sounds nice. I'm a little jealous, I'm stuck at work. I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines.
That's awesome! I love flying. I'm actually moving to a new city soon to pursue my culinary dreams. I'll be working in a restaurant there.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great. I love cooking too, but I'm not nearly as good as a professional chef.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started. I'm also a little nervous, but that's to be expected.
I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of food do you like to cook?
I love all kinds of food, but I'm especially passionate about Italian food.
I love Italian food too! I'm not sure if I've ever had it cooked by a professional chef, though.
You'll definitely have to come to my restaurant and try it sometime!
Great! I'll be sure to give you a discount.
